member.name: T:RESTWebServicesDTO.Request.NewFutureOptionRequestDTO
member.summary: Represents an incoming message for booking future or option instructions to the IP

member.name: P:RESTWebServicesDTO.Request.NewFutureOptionRequestDTO.Reference
member.summary: Pru Bache serial number, example - A2011006056D900

member.name: P:RESTWebServicesDTO.Request.NewFutureOptionRequestDTO.HarmonyReference
member.summary: Traiana reference number, example - 53841332

member.name: P:RESTWebServicesDTO.Request.NewFutureOptionRequestDTO.Source
member.summary: Trading Platform, example - PruBache

member.name: P:RESTWebServicesDTO.Request.NewFutureOptionRequestDTO.Type
member.summary: Future or Option (this will make it easier to apply the correct scheme for decoding the symbol), example - Future

member.name: P:RESTWebServicesDTO.Request.NewFutureOptionRequestDTO.Direction
member.summary: Buy or Sell

member.name: P:RESTWebServicesDTO.Request.NewFutureOptionRequestDTO.Quantity
member.summary: Will be converted to the G2 equivalent where required, example - 70000.00

member.name: P:RESTWebServicesDTO.Request.NewFutureOptionRequestDTO.Instrument
member.summary: Maps to a G2 market, example - ABC123

member.name: P:RESTWebServicesDTO.Request.NewFutureOptionRequestDTO.Price
member.summary: Price, example - 12345.67

member.name: P:RESTWebServicesDTO.Request.NewFutureOptionRequestDTO.TradeDateTime
member.summary: YYYYMMDDHHMMSS, example - 20110112081435

member.name: P:RESTWebServicesDTO.Request.NewFutureOptionRequestDTO.DealerId
member.summary: Used to map to a G2 user, example - nicolaposkitt

member.name: P:RESTWebServicesDTO.Request.NewFutureOptionRequestDTO.Book
member.summary: Optional book depending if we have an available field for this, example - A

member.name: T:RESTWebServicesDTO.ErrorCode
member.summary: This is a description of the ErrorCode enum.

member.name: F:RESTWebServicesDTO.ErrorCode.NoError
member.summary: No error has occured.

member.name: F:RESTWebServicesDTO.ErrorCode.Forbidden
member.summary: The server understood the request, but is refusing to fulfill it.

member.name: F:RESTWebServicesDTO.ErrorCode.InternalServerError
member.summary: An unexpected condition was encountered by the server preventing it from fulfilling the request.

member.name: F:RESTWebServicesDTO.ErrorCode.InvalidParameterType
member.summary: Server could not understand request due to an invalid parameter type.

member.name: F:RESTWebServicesDTO.ErrorCode.ParameterMissing
member.summary: Server could not understand request due to a missing parameter.

member.name: F:RESTWebServicesDTO.ErrorCode.InvalidParameterValue
member.summary: Server could not understand request due to an invalid parameter value.

member.name: F:RESTWebServicesDTO.ErrorCode.InvalidJsonRequest
member.summary: Server could not understand request due to an invalid JSON request.

member.name: F:RESTWebServicesDTO.ErrorCode.InvalidJsonRequestCaseFormat
member.summary: Server could not understand request due to an invalid JSON case format.

member.name: F:RESTWebServicesDTO.ErrorCode.InvalidCredentials
member.summary: The credentials used to authenticate are invalid. Either the username, password or both are incorrect.

member.name: F:RESTWebServicesDTO.ErrorCode.InvalidSession
member.summary: The session credentials supplied are invalid.

member.name: F:RESTWebServicesDTO.ErrorCode.NoDataAvailable
member.summary: There is no data available.

member.name: F:RESTWebServicesDTO.ErrorCode.Throttling
member.summary: Request has been throttled.
